trans-unit.source: Represents a number elements found in a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> which represent security tokens.
This class is not thread-safe.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement"></xref> class by using a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> object.

When this constructor is used, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.GetIdentities%2A> method is not supported by the new instance unless the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.CreateSubject%2A> method is overridden.

If the `securityToken` parameter is an instance of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityToken> then the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.SecurityTokenXml%2A> property is set to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityToken.TokenXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
The security token that the new instance represents.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement"></xref> class by using the specified XML representation of a security token.
The XML representation of the security token.
The default token handler collection that is used to read and validate the security token wrapped by the new instance.
Gets the identities that are contained in the wrapped token.
The identities that are contained in the token.
Gets the security token that is represented by the current instance.

If the current instance was not constructed explicitly from a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> object by using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor, then the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.ReadSecurityToken%2A> method is called to return the security token.
The security token that the current instance represents.
Deserializes a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> from the specified XML representation.
The XML representation of the security token.
The token handler collection to use to read the token.
The security token that was deserialized from the XML.
Gets the XML representation of the wrapped token.

This property is `null` unless the current instance was initialized by using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlElement%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor.
The XML representation of the token.
Creates the identities that are contained in the specified XML representation of a security token.
The XML representation of the security token.
The token handler collection to use to read the token.
The identities that are contained in the token.
securityTokenXml is `null`.
-or-
securityTokenHandlers is `null`.
